s1_text: 随时随地控制您的家。设置理想的场景，让更多设备协同工作。随时监控电耗。轻松享受智能照明的便利。
s2_title: 设置场景 快捷控制多个灯具
s2_text: 可创建场景，同时控制多个已连接的灯具。轻点场景或吩咐 Siri，可将它开启或关闭。
s3_text: Koogeek 智能调光开关兼容 Apple HomeKit。您可使用 iPhone、iPad、iPod touch 或者 Apple Watch，通过 Koogeek Home app 进行控制或者直接使用 Siri 进行语音控制。
s4_title: 随时随地 远程控制
s4_text: 您可以将 HomePod、Apple TV 4K、Apple TV（第 4 代）或 iPad 设置为家居中枢，以便随时随地在 iOS 设备上实现对已连接设备的控制。即便不在家，也可随时控制。
s5_title: 支持 Siri 语音调光
s5_text: 可通过 Siri 语音命令调整亮度。支持对 200W 以内的白炽灯、LED 及 CFL 进行调光。
s6_text: The Dimmer Switch is one of the most advanced dimmers available, simply with long press to set lighting at minimum and maximum brightness levels or turn on/off the switch by short pressing the button.
s7_text: Check real-time power consumption and monitor daily and monthly electric power consumption via the Koogeek Home app on your iOS devices.
s8_text: Custom schedule and set timers, let your lights function automatically. On at sunset, off at bedtime. Or whenever else meet your daily routine.
s9_text: The switch will automatically cut off when the internal temperature reaches 85℃ or the current is over 12A. Adopt V-0 grade flame-retardant PC panel
s10_icon1: The switch will automatically cut off when the internal temperature reaches 85。C or the current is over 12A. Adopt V-0 grade flame-retardant PC panel.
s10_icon2: The built-in protect circuit can prevent surge current and ensure the regular and reliable operation of the switch.
s10_icon3: Provide advanced security with end-to-end encryption and authentication between a HomeKit-enabled accessory and your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch.
s11_text: Fireproof material. Adopt V-0 grade flame-retardant PC panel. Adopt industrial-grade IOT chip with low-power consumption from 0.7W to 1 W. Bring you a double experience of energy saving and peace of mind!
s12_icon: TIPS: This is an electrical shock hazard. Please call a professional electrician if you are unfamiliar or uncomfortable with electrical work.
s13_title: Find the Option Most Fit You
